Package: grails.utils.enums

[Groovy] Enum MonthsOfYear

    • grails.utils.enums.MonthsOfYear

    • DaysOfMonth is a representation of each month day which according to number formatting of icu4j the numeric presentation of that number is provided so in short draws out 1..31 either by string based on locale and gives us the day numbering per local Arabic numbers of 1..31 as an example

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          int  month
          java.lang.String  monthNumber
          This looks rather pointless since numeric month number 1 = 1 in string as well but in different locales 1 is presented sometimes in a String format : Arabic 1 = Û± which isn't numeric but a string unicode character.
